products.title: Neapolitan Silver, Sapphire, Tourmaline and Emerald Ring
products.description: Seb Brown's 'Neapolitan' ring is cast from recycled silver polished to a high shine but left with a characterfully brushed quality. Sapphire, tourmaline and emerald stones bring a vibrant finish to its crown.

products.title: Jumbo Rainbow Gold Multi-Stone Bracelet
products.description: Chunky chain jewellery is a signature of SHAY founders, mother-daughter duo Mmes Ladan and Tania Shayan. Cast from gold, every five links of this bracelet is encrusted with pavéd pink and blue sapphires, rubies, garnets and citrines.

products.title: Gold and Diamond Necklace
products.description: OLE LYNGGAARD COPENHAGEN's necklace is strung with an elephant pendant, inspired by the founder's love for wildlife. It's cast from matte gold and set with a cluster of 24 diamonds that emulate the spray from the mammoth's trunk.

products.title: Premium Gentlemen Gold and Blackened Silver Multi-Stone Cufflinks
products.description: Buccellati recently celebrated its centenary, and crafts with skills honed by generations of master jewellers. Encased in engraved gold settings, these cufflinks are stippled with a mosaic of rubies, sapphires and emeralds, alongside silver beading that's blackened for a Baroque effect.

products.title: Rose Gold, Sapphire and Diamond Ring
products.description: Mother-daughter duo Suzanne and Patile Kalan design fine jewellery that is timeless and meant to be worn forever. This one of a kind ring has been handmade in Los Angeles - like all their collections - from rose gold and decorated with baguette diamonds and pink sapphires. Wear it on its own or pair it alongside one of the brand's colourful cuffs.

products.title: Crescent Gold Diamond Single Earring
products.description: Foundrae ensures every element of its jewellery is symbolic - the crescent on the disk charm of this earring, for instance, represents growth and development. Crafted from gold, it has a long oval shape and eight diamonds illuminating the tiny moon.

products.title: The Equinox 18-Karat Gold Ring
products.description: Taking its name from one of the most famous astronomical phenomena, MAOR's 'The Equinox' ring is inspired by orbital planetary movements. It's cast from 18-karat gold in a slim profile that'll work solo or stacked with other styles.

products.title: Key White Gold, Silver and Diamond Pendant Necklace
products.description: EÉRA's necklace features a silver key pendant coated in bright-green PVD - a hardware-inspired design that's become one of the brand's signature styles. Crafted in Italy, it's detailed with white diamonds and slipped on a delicate white gold chain.

products.title: Possession 18-Karat White Gold Diamond Ring
products.description: Piaget's 'Possession' collection is defined by the turning mechanisms incorporated into each design. This ring is made from 18-karat white gold and features signature rotating bands inset with diamonds. Wear it solo or stacked with the rose gold version.
